mapper.select: SELECT proj_id, proj_mem_id, proj_title, proj_sort, proj_indus, proj_price, proj_margin, proj_nation, proj_supply_type, proj_recruit_num, proj_detail, proj_detail_img as proj_detail_img_list, proj_require, proj_keyword, proj_file, proj_hit, proj_prod_certi, proj_state, proj_reg_date, date_format(proj_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as proj_end_date, proj_edit_date, proj_channel FROM ProjectList WHERE proj_id = #{projId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProjectList p INNER JOIN IndusList i ON p.proj_indus = i.indus_id
OR proj_detail LIKE concat('%', #{projDetail}, '%')
OR i.indus_name LIKE concat('%', #{projIndusName}, '%')
OR proj_keyword LIKE concat('%', #{projKeyword}, '%')
OR proj_mem_id LIKE concat('%', #{projMemId}, '%')
OR proj_title LIKE concat('%', #{projTitle}, '%')
